description: Dataset containing subject-level longitudinal clinical data where each file contains aggregate level subject data across multiple timepoints

alternateName.description: An alternate name that can be used for search and discovery improvement.
alternateName.title: Alternate Name

assessmentTypes.description: Types of clinical assessments included in the dataset
assessmentTypes.title: Assessment Types

citation.description: identifies academic articles that are recommended by the data provider be cited in addition to the dataset itself.
citation.title: Citation

clinicalDomain.description: The primary clinical domain or area of focus for the data

items.description: Primary clinical domains for ALS research and assessment
items.title: ClinicalDomainEnum

clinicalDomain.title: Clinical Domain

items.description: Original collection, e.g. the consortium that the dataset comes from.
enum: New York Genome Center ALS Consortium
items.title: CollectionEnum

contributor.description: Institution or person responsible for collecting and managing the files and records in the dataset.
contributor.title: Contributor(s)

creator.description: Properly formatted name of the organization or person that is creator of the dataset (e.g. "Sage Bionetworks" or "John Doe"), not an id. Most preferred is the project PI or data lead who's responsible for its conception and initial content creation.
creator.title: Creator

dataType.description: Clinical data types (assessments, treatments, medical history, etc.)
dataType.title: Data Type

datePublished.description: Date data were published/available on Synapse.
datePublished.title: Date Published

description.description: Blurb for the dataset; should be no more than 500 characters.
description.title: Description

disease.description: Disease(s) or condition(s) studied in the dataset.
disease.title: Disease

includedInDataCatalog.description: Link(s) to known data catalog(s) the dataset is included in.
includedInDataCatalog.title: Included In Data Catalog

individualCount.description: Number of unique individuals included in the dataset (whether as individual-level or as aggregate data). Omit if not applicable/unknown.
individualCount.title: Individual Count

license.description: Unless information for license is clear, this should default to UNKNOWN.
license.title: License

primaryOutcome.description: Primary clinical endpoint or outcome measure
primaryOutcome.title: Primary Outcome Measure

publisher.description: Name of the organization or person responsible for making the dataset available.
publisher.title: Publisher

sameAs.description: Another platform's URI or compact URI for this same resource. See https://www.w3.org/TR/owl-ref/#sameAs-def.
sameAs.title: Same As

source.description: Host platform from which the dataset was sourced.
source.title: Source

species.description: Species of the organism(s) from which the data were generated. Omit property if not applicable, such as for data like compounds or other non-biological data.
species.title: Species

subject.description: Applicable subject term(s) for dataset cataloging; use the Library of Congress Subject Headings (LCSH) scheme.
subject.title: Subject

url.description: URL for the original dataset location at source.
url.title: URL

title: ClinicalDataset
